30.52.text: of this Christmas season of University Challenge for grown-ups

36.12.text: We no longer need to know that team members

38.40.text: have walked across the polar ice cap unaided,

42.28.text: or can play the ukulele with their ankles.

45.48.text: For we are now at the first of the semifinals.

47.28.text: Be you never so great a panjandrum,

49.64.text: all that matters now is, can you answer the question?

53.36.text: Now, the team from the University of Kent

55.80.text: had the highest score in the first-round matches.

58.44.text: 245 against the 35 earned by a plucky team from Sussex University,

64.60.text: who at least avoided falling into the trap of overthinking their answers.

73.96.text: A news journalist formerly with the BBC, ITN and Al Jazeera,

93.52.text: and a leading authority in the field of acoustics.

96.04.text: Let's meet the Kent team again.

126.00.text: with a degree in English and American literature.

189.04.text: most distinctive and prolific political cartoonists.

1706.84.text: But until then, it's goodbye from Kent University.

1713.00.text: And it's goodbye from me. Goodbye.
